item.title: How AI Is Transforming Modern Software Development in 2025
item.description: AI now powers every stage of the software lifecycle—from product engineering and QA to cloud automation and CRM intelligence—helping teams ship faster and smarter.

item.title: How AI Finds Similar Tiles from a Photo: Complete Guide

item.title: The Future of Tile Design Discovery Using Computer Vision
item.description: Explore how computer vision and AI are transforming the tile industry and what it means for manufacturers and designers.
